answers.author: Roderick Wood
answers.text:
I waited a couple of days to give them some time and space to deal with the issue emotionally and then took them to lunch told them I would have been pleased to have worked for them had they been selected.  I told them I respected them and looked forward to the opportunity to continue to work with together as a peers to help the city keep moving forward. It worked well one time and not so well the other.  I like to think that is because the other person was so hurt they just could not get past it more then my inability to make it work.  Still, think often about what I might have done different to have made that relationship  work.

text: I was recently appointed as a CAO and have learned that a department head, whom I supervise, applied for the position also.  For those who have also had this experience, how did you deal with this situation?
title: Chosen over a department head
